source_objects.title: Project Management
source_objects.description: Master Project Management with courses on: PMI RMP, PRINCE Foundation certification, software project management, CBAP, project planning and execution.

items.title: Learn the Basics of Project Management - PMP Training 101
items.headline: Become A Project Manager : Project Management 101 : PMP Certification Training : Project Management Process : Tutorial
objectives_summary: Learn the definition of project management
Identify the distinguishing characteristics of a project versus other processes in the organization,
Employ commonly used techniques for selecting projects from a list of candidate projects

items.title: Construction Claims: Proving & Pricing Acceleration Claims
items.headline: This is an advanced, workshop based, intense bootcamp on calculation of quantum for Acceleration Claims
objectives_summary: This Master Course will provide you with the knowledge, expertise and practical tools to prepare ADVANCED quantum calculations for Acceleration Claims

items.title: BPMN 2.0 Master Guide: Learn Process Modeling from Scratch
items.headline: Create your First Process Models with simplicity using BIZAGI. Includes Real-World business cases and exercises!
objectives_summary: Model any Real-World Business Processes easily!
Learn how to use Events, Tasks and Gateways
Understand how to use Pools, Lines and Phases (Swimlanes)

label.title: BPMN Business Process Model and Notation
label.display_name: BPMN Business Process Model and Notation

label.title: BPMN Business Process Model and Notation
label.display_name: BPMN Business Process Model and Notation

items.title: Microsoft Project Online PWA - Basic Setup for Admins
items.headline: Master Project Online & Project Server PWA:  Configure Security Groups, Resource Pools, Create Custom Fields  and More!
objectives_summary: Students will learn the essentials on how to administer a Microsoft Project Online environment.  This includes setting up Microsoft 365 users and groups to be incorporated into Project Online.

items.title: Agile 101-A simple introduction to Agile origin & principles
items.headline: Agile 101- A high level, but comprehensive introduction to Agile from it's origins up to the present
objectives_summary: A fundamental understanding of the Agile basics
A brief recap of Lean
A history of Agile over the last 20 years

items.title: Hybrid Project Management for Project Managers
items.headline: Agile? Waterfall? Why not both? Learn the benefits of these approaches to develop your own recipe for project success.
objectives_summary: Discover the value of a hybrid methodology and how it can benefit your projects
Identify the advantages and drawbacks of waterfall & agile methods and how each can contribute to your hybrid
Pinpoint the technical and people skills needed to successfully execute a hybrid project

items.title: Project Management Fundamentals: Quality Management

visible_instructors.job_title: Sr. Technical Cross Platform Program Manager
visible_instructors.title: Luke Angel

items.headline: Quality is never an accident. It is always the result of intelligent effort. Learn how to make quality management guru
objectives_summary: Quality Management Fundamentals
Quality Management Components
Quality Assurance Techniques

items.title: Becoming a Project Manager
items.headline: With 10,000 jobs advertised every day, Project Management is a great career opportunity.
objectives_summary: Maximize productivity at team meetings
Communicate with sponsors and executives more effectively
Identify and manage risks

items.title: PMBOK 6 -ALL 13 CHAPTERS
items.headline: PMBOK 6 -ALL 13 CHAPTERS
objectives_summary: PMBOK 6 -ALL 13 CHAPTERS

items.title: Part 1/4 - Document controller and EDMS implementation Step
items.headline: Become a Document controller by Understanding basic about Document and Record Management with implementation of EDMS
objectives_summary: How to become a Document controller ?The study will also help him in a life-long learning journey.
Document and Record management courses will support your learning and achievement in your job because you will develop skills for managing information.
The topics of the courses focus on the use of best practices by the student so that it gives the best effect while attending the interviews.

items.title: You Think You're Ready for the NEW 2021 PMP Exam?
items.headline: Full Length Situational PMP Practice Exams (Agile & NEW Question Types) based on the 2021 Exam Outline
objectives_summary: 540 questions specifically developed for the 2021 PMP exam
Proportioned across the three domains and tasks
Extensive focus on agile and the people domain

items.title: Kanban for Software Development Teams
items.headline: Learn how to implement kanban principles and practices to improve software development process.
objectives_summary: Implement Kanban Practices in software development projects
Using Information radiators in Projects
Improving flow of development work

items.headline: Build a program plan, Program Manager Role, How to manage programs, Why programs and not projects portfolio management
objectives_summary: Finish this class and leave a constructive feedback and you get 1h program management coaching session with me
What is a program, What is not a program?
What’s the difference between program vs project vs projects portfolio

items.title: Procurement Management (PMI - PMP)
items.headline: Project Management Professional Certification Program (PMI-PMP)
objectives_summary: Recognize the inputs to the Conduct Procurements process
Match Conduct Procurement tools and techniques with the most appropriate activities
Recognize outputs of the Conduct Procurements process

items.title: PMI-ACP Certification: The Scrum Development Process
items.headline: Agile Certified Practitioner Certification Program (PMI-ACP) - Course 3 of 8 - The Scrum Development Process
objectives_summary: Understand Scrum team roles and their corresponding responsibilities
Identify guidelines for effective stakeholder communication and match project activities with their corresponding phases in the Scrum development process.
Recognize activities that take place during the pre-game phase of a Scrum project,  describe the activities that take place during a sprint

items.title: HVAC Ductwork Quantity Take off for Quantity Surveyors
items.headline: HVAC, Duct, Take off, Estimation, Quantity Surveying, Length, Area, Weight, SMACNA, POMI, AUTOCAD, Excel, Template, MEP
